org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.spi

Interface DatastoreConfiguration<G extends GlobalContext<?,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - the type of GlobalContext supported by the represented datastore

    public interface DatastoreConfiguration<G extends GlobalContext<?,?>>
    Represents a specific datastore to the user and allows to invoke store-specific operations.
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      G getConfigurationBuilder()
      Returns a store-specific GlobalContext object which allows to apply configuration options on a global, entity and property level.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigurationBuilder

        G getConfigurationBuilder()
        Returns a store-specific GlobalContext object which allows to apply configuration options on a global, entity and property level.
        Returns:
        a store-specific GlobalContext object
